string.value: There have been subtle signs that indicate the revival of the Arans. Talk to Cassandra for details.
Ice Shards from the ice the Arans were sealed in have been found near town. Where are those Ice Shards?
The Aran Memory Fragments...How long will it take for you to collect all 12?
Yes, there have been indications everywhere that have foreshadowed their revival. You should know what those signs are in order to find their Memory Fragments.
According to what my Crystal Ball has shown me, the ice in which the heroes were sealed has started to crack as the curse weakens.
You'll be able to find the Ice Shards near town. That would definitely help you find their Memory Fragments.
You mean you're ready to give up on finding the Aran Memory Fragments?
If you spot an Ice Shard while passing by the Hunting Ground, don't just ignore it!
